item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 5, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple M3 Ultra (385 points | 431 comments)
2. My Beancount books are 95% automatic after 3 years (2024) (45 points | 12 comments)
3. Richard Sutton and Andrew Barto Win 2024 Turing Award (312 points | 66 comments)

6. Greptile (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
7. Apple unveils new Mac Studio, the most powerful Mac ever, featuring M4 Max (139 points | 104 comments)
8. Design and Explore Noise Handshake Patterns (2018) (14 points | discuss)
9. MS Paint IDE (61 points | 18 comments)
10. The Differences Between Deep Research, Deep Research, and Deep Research (115 points | 27 comments)
11. Writing an LLM from scratch, part 8 – trainable self-attention (350 points | 26 comments)
12. After 120 years, Yellowstone bison are a single breeding population (20 points | 1 comment)
13. Why Vermont farmers are using urine on their crops (85 points | 69 comments)
14. MacBook Air M4 (268 points | 254 comments)
15. NASA Successfully Acquires GPS Signals on Moon (175 points | 86 comments)
16. Lynx: Open Source Native Cross Platform framework used in TikTok (48 points | 11 comments)

18. Mox – modern, secure, all-in-one email server (455 points | 255 comments)

20. NetBSD on a JavaStation (130 points | 59 comments)
21. Asteroid fragments upend theory of how life on Earth bloomed (76 points | 32 comments)
22. The Return of Digg, a Star of an Earlier Internet Era (96 points | 113 comments)
23. Rotors: A practical introduction for 3D graphics (2023) (46 points | 8 comments)
24. Brother accused of locking down third-party printer ink cartridges (444 points | 278 comments)
25. The Planemaker Who Walked Beneath the Water (11 points | 1 comment)
26. Launch HN: Enhanced Radar (YC W25) – A safety net for air traffic control (155 points | 105 comments)
27. Why fastDOOM is fast (630 points | 199 comments)
28. Delta Chat – Email Based PGP Encrypted Chat (126 points | 61 comments)
29. A Map of Python (149 points | 23 comments)
30. What Vivian Maier saw in color (2018) (32 points | 8 comments)
